document.full_text: the dalai lama has urged restraint in a stand-off between security forces and tibetans at a buddhist monastery in southwest china, said to have been sparked by the self-immolation of a monk last month.
document.title: dalai lama urges restraint in tibet monastery standoff
lines_and_colors: the dalai lama has urged restraint in a stand-off between security forces and tibetans at a buddhist monastery in southwest china, said to have been sparked by the self-immolation of a monk last month.
